alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 4:47PM MST until March 06 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... Accumulating snow has briefly ended for this evening. Therefore, the Winter Storm Warning has been allowed to expire at 5 PM MST. However, snow and locally windy conditions will redevelop tonight resulting in additional snow accumulations and some travel hazards through Sunday morning. A Winter Weather Advisory has been issued starting at 11 PM tonight for snow and some blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
